params.integrations: the integrations and weights that form the strategy
params.maxCap: The maximum amount investable in a strategy
params.name: the name of the new strategy

params.tokens: The list of tokens to clear

params.amount: the amount to reduce the vector by
params.poolID: the pool within the integration that handled the tokens

params.id: the strategy to withdraw assets from
params.tokens: details of the tokens being deposited

deleteStrategy(uint256).details: This can only be called successfully if the strategy being deleted doesn't have any assets invested in it.To delete a strategy with funds deployed in it, first update the strategy so that the existing tokens are no longer available in the strategy, then delete the strategy. This will unwind the users positions, and they will be able to withdraw their funds.

params.poolID: the pool within the integration that should receive the tokens

returns.cap: the maximum cap for the strategy/token pair

params.ids: The ids of the strategies to return.

params._strategies: The strategies to retrieve balances for

params.token: The token to retrieve the balance for

returns.amount: the amount of token that is invested in the strategy

params.token: the token to fetch the balance for

returns.amount: the amount of the token currently invested

params.maxCap: The maximum amount of funds that can be invested

params.integrations: the new integrations that will be used
params.tokens: the tokens accepted for new entries

addStrategy(string,(address,uint32)[],(u.notice: Adds a new strategy to the list of available strategies

clearClosablePositions(address[]).notice: Clears the list of positions that can be closed to supply a token

closePositionsForWithdrawal(address,uint.notice: Closes enough positions to provide a requested amount of a token

decreaseDeployAmountChange(address,uint3.notice: Decreases the deployable amount after a deployment/withdrawal

decreaseStrategy(uint256,(address,uint25.notice: Decreases the amount of a set of tokens invested in a strategy

getDeployAmount(address,uint32,address).notice: Returns the current amount awaiting deployment

getMaximumCap(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves the maximum cap for a strategy/token pair

getMultipleStrategies(uint256[]).notice: Returns 1 or more strategies in a single call.

getStrategy(uint256).notice: Getter function to return the nested arrays as well as the name

getStrategyBalances(uint256[],address[]).notice: Returns balances per strategy, and total invested balances

getStrategyTokenBalance(uint256,address).notice: Returns the amount of a given token currently invested in a strategy

getStrategyTokenLength(uint256).notice: returns the length of the tokens array in a strategy

getTokenTotalBalance(address).notice: Returns the total amount of a token invested across all strategies

increaseStrategy(uint256,(address,uint25.notice: Increases the amount of a set of tokens in a strategy

increaseTokenBalance(uint256,(address,ui.notice: Increases strategy balances without increasing the deploy amount

setMaximumCap(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Sets the maximum investment cap for a strategy and token pair

updateStrategy(uint256,(address,uint32)[.notice: Updates a strategy's integrations and tokens
